EmailTemplate.description: Important Updates to Your Office Depot Business Account
EmailTemplate.name: Important Updates to Your Office Depot Business Account
EmailTemplate.subject: Important Updates to Your Office Depot Business Account
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
We want to thank you for your continued partnership and wish you a Happy New Year. In order to optimize your overall experience, your account will now be serviced by our award winning customer service team. You can not get 24/7 support through our best-in-class website, pluse customer service support Monday through Friday from 8AM to 8 PM ET.
Remember, you can shop and save with us anytime, anywhere:
Online: business.officedepot.com By phone: 888-2-OFFICE (888-263-3423) In store: using yoiur Store Purchasing Card
Meeting and exceeding your needs, now and in the future, is our #1 goal. Thank you again for your loyalty. We look forward to a prosperous and successful 2017.
